mapper.insert:
select review_seq.nextval from dual
insert into review(reviewno, smemberid, content, communication, result, memberid, name, pno, avg, cgname) values(#{reviewNo}, #{sMemberid}, #{content}, #{communication}, #{result}, #{memberid}, #{name}, #{pNo}, (#{communication}+#{result})/2, #{cgName})
mapper.select: select sum(avg) / count(*) as AVG from review where smemberid=#{sMemberid}
select round(round(sum(communication) / count(*)) / 10) as COMAVG from review where smemberid=#{sMemberid}
select round(round(sum(result) / count(*)) / 10) as RESAVG from review where smemberid=#{sMemberid}
select c.cgname from review r left join rqpayment q on r.pno=q.pno left join payfinish p on q.pickno=p.pickno left join category c on p.cgno=c.cgno where r.pno = #{pNo}
